question: Which Union Ministry is to launch the ‘Atmanirbhar Bharat Saptah’ (Self-reliant India week)?
explanation:
Union Defence minister Rajnath Singh launched the ‘Atmanirbhar Bharat Saptah’ (Self-reliant India week).
The campaign aims to promote the domestic production of Defence equipment in India. Earlier, the Ministry announced that import of over 100 weapons and military platforms will be restricted in a phased manner till 2024
